conbody.p: To minimize the conflict in a team having more than one member, you should define a process from the very beginning so that all team members are on the same page when using Git.
Below are some suggestions for good practices:

ul.li: Commit often: do not wait until many scripts are created to commit and push to the Git remote repository. The smaller the set of scripts is pushed, the easier you resolve the conflict.
Pull changes from the Git remote repository before working on new scripts and before committing. Each member works on each feature at a time.
